messages.message: @Mohit Refiner runs an automated test on the release branch using Cypress, which has to happen locally. Could you please share the branch for this release so I can check it out locally and run the Refiner tests?

@Youssef the purpose of this UAT is to test the multi cluster environment, so we cannot do that locally, should be done on  https://active.sandbox.instabase.com/. Cypress cannot be configured to use https://active.sandbox.instabase.com/?
We donâ€™t have this in place yet, but if this is the case I can do it manually

The failed tests are all OCR golden mismatch . Do we have a different OCR running in Sandbox?
@Youssef If it helps, we are mostly focussed on running tests that use redis or celery.

@Karthik S we are running ari and msft. Thanks for running the tests promptly. If there is just golden mismatch due to OCRs, i think we can safely ignore that, the changes we are testing is redis/celery. Does that sound reasonable?
